column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. mashriqī. tawshīḥ mujtathth lābin sahil

column2: waqlun liqatīl al-ḥabb wafīt ḥuqqah , w lilmudda‘á hayhāta! mā al-kḥl al-kḥl

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. mashriqī .  tawshīḥ mutadārak li’aḥmad bn al-ḥusn al-mawṣilī

column3: ghayr shawqī ilayk mā lah ḥadd
fī mlāḥ al-zamān fī al-ḥusn fard
yā ḥabībī walam azal bik ahdū
